This is a short tutorial to learn just enough [Git](https://git-scm.com/)
and [GitHub](https://github.com/) to contribute to
an open source project with confidence. I explain how you only need to learn
10 commands and a few workflows, in order to use Git to collaborate with others.

Presented at [Portland R User Group](https://www.meetup.com/portland-r-user-group/),
Portland, Oregon on 2021-02-23.
